summary: Syntax highlighting for Bird configuration files
name: Bird-Syntax
description:
This is a syntax file for the Bird Internet Routing Daemon configuration files.  It supports all keywords as of Bird version 1.2.4, along with filter, function, and protocol section folding.

Bird information can be found here: http://bird.network.cz/

There isn't any accompanying file type detection, so you'll need to ":setf bird" or use a modeline, a la:

# vim: set ft=bird nosta noet ts=4 sw=4:
